User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_6_7) AppleWebKit/534.24 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/11.0.696.71 Safari/534.24
Build Identifier: 4.0.1

Multiple users using Firefox 4.0.1 on Windows Vista report a problem with using http://www.mapnificent.net/berlin/ : the HTML5 2D Canvas that lays on top of the map is just rendered black. All other browsers, different versions of Firefox are reportedly working. The canvas rendering uses globalAlpha, lots of arcs and globalCompositeOperation (which I suspect to be the cause here).

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open Firefox 4.0.1 on Windows Vista
2. Open the web page http://www.mapnificent.net/berlin/


Actual Results:  
The rendering of the page is reportedly black. Please compare rendering of the page to a different browser or Firefox version.

Expected Results:  
The page should render a travel time map like in previous versions of Firefox.
